name: Egypt Puzzle Explorers
description:
Solve Egyptian Block Puzzles by moving Stone blocks out of the way, step into pressure plates to trigger Secret Passages and try to not get trapped before reaching the exit passageway! 

Drag and Drop mechanics to move your player and stone blocks into the grids. You can only move blocks that are directly connected to your player position and you can't cross them over each other. 

Drop player into the exit archway to proceed to next level.


More than 60 levels and 4 challenges as Sliding Block Puzzles between stages!

Downloads available for Android / Windows / Linux.

You can try for free the web version on Kongregate (may display ads): Try for Free Here!
